item.title: Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. Announces 10% Dividend Increase and Declares First Quarter 2017 Common Share Dividend of U.S. $0.1165 (Cdn. $0.1533)
item.description: [PR Newswire] - OAKVILLE, ON, Jan. 16, 2017 /PRNewswire/ - Algonquin Power & Utilities Corp. ("APUC") (TSX: AQN, NYSE: AQN) announced that the Board of Directors of APUC (the "Board") approved a dividend increase of U.S. $0.0424 annually per common share for a total annual dividend of U.S. $0.4659 per common share, paid quarterly at a rate of U.S. $0.1165 per common share. APUC also announced today that the Board has declared a dividend of U.S. $0.1165 per share on its common shares, payable on April 14, 2017 to the shareholders of record on March 31, 2017 for the period from January 1, 2017 to March 31, 2017.
